alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Clarke; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Barrow, northwestern Clarke and southeastern Jackson Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 316 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Statham, or near Jefferson, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Athens, Statham, Arcade, Nicholson, Athens-Clarke County, Westgate Park, James Holland Youth Sports Cmpx, Bear Creek Reservoir, Beechwood Hills, Sandy Creek Recreation Area, Oconee Heights and State Botanical Garden Of Ga. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
